trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing"></xref> event.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event occurs just before a form is closed, either by the user, through the user interface (UI), or programmatically, through calls to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>关闭窗体，可由用户通过用户界面 (UI)，或以编程方式，通过对等<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>类，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A>在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>类</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>中</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A>的方法的调用之前，发生事件</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>

trans-unit.source: When you create a FormClosingEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当创建 FormClosingEventHandler 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。
